name: Have an Eater of Souls or Crimera spawn from hitting a tree
Create the following biome: Evil Ocean
Shoot a monster with a poison dart from a blowpipe or blowgun
Defeat unique bosses using only each of the following classes: Melee, Mage
!! Never take damage from a trap !!
Wear a full set of Necro armor
Kill a Maggot Zombie, Ghost, and Raven
Defeat Wall of Flesh without preparing a bridge/arena
Never have more than 5 Town NPCs housed at once
Kill a monster using a Sandgun
Have "BINGO" appear in chat using an announcement box
Drown with a breathing reed in hand
